trans-unit.source: What is Azure Machine Learning Studio?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Machine Learning Studio?

trans-unit.source: | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Overview of Azure ML Studio, a drag-and-drop tool for quickly building models from a ready-to-use library of algorithms and modules.
trans-unit.target: Overview of Azure ML Studio, a drag-and-drop tool for quickly building models from a ready-to-use library of algorithms and modules.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Machine Learning Studio?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Machine Learning Studio?

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio is a collaborative, drag-and-drop tool you can use to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics solutions on your data.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio is a collaborative, drag-and-drop tool you can use to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics solutions on your data.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Studio publishes models as web services that can easily be consumed by custom apps or BI tools such as Excel.
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Studio publishes models as web services that can easily be consumed by custom apps or BI tools such as Excel.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Studio is where data science, predictive analytics, cloud resources, and your data meet.
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Studio is where data science, predictive analytics, cloud resources, and your data meet.

trans-unit.source: The Machine Learning Studio interactive workspace
trans-unit.target: The Machine Learning Studio interactive workspace

trans-unit.source: To develop a predictive analysis model, you typically use data from one or more sources, transform and analyze that data through various data manipulation and statistical functions, and generate a set of results.
trans-unit.target: To develop a predictive analysis model, you typically use data from one or more sources, transform and analyze that data through various data manipulation and statistical functions, and generate a set of results.

trans-unit.source: Developing a model like this is an iterative process.
trans-unit.target: Developing a model like this is an iterative process.

trans-unit.source: As you modify the various functions and their parameters, your results converge until you are satisfied that you have a trained, effective model.
trans-unit.target: As you modify the various functions and their parameters, your results converge until you are satisfied that you have a trained, effective model.

trans-unit.source: **Azure Machine Learning Studio** gives you an interactive, visual workspace to easily build, test, and iterate on a predictive analysis model.
trans-unit.target: **Azure Machine Learning Studio** gives you an interactive, visual workspace to easily build, test, and iterate on a predictive analysis model.

trans-unit.source: You drag-and-drop ***datasets*** and analysis ***modules*** onto an interactive ***canvas***, connecting them together to form an ***experiment***, which you ***run*** in Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: You drag-and-drop ***datasets*** and analysis ***modules*** onto an interactive ***canvas***, connecting them together to form an ***experiment***, which you ***run*** in Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: To iterate on your model design, you ***edit*** the experiment, ***save*** a copy if desired, and run it again.
trans-unit.target: To iterate on your model design, you ***edit*** the experiment, ***save*** a copy if desired, and run it again.

trans-unit.source: When you're ready, you can convert your ***training experiment*** to a ***predictive experiment***, and then ***publish*** it as a ***web service*** so that your model can be accessed by others.
trans-unit.target: When you're ready, you can convert your ***training experiment*** to a ***predictive experiment***, and then ***publish*** it as a ***web service*** so that your model can be accessed by others.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] To download and print a diagram that gives an overview of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio, see [Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities](machine-learning-studio-overview-diagram.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] To download and print a diagram that gives an overview of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio, see [Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities](machine-learning-studio-overview-diagram.md).

trans-unit.source: There is no programming required, just visually connecting datasets and modules to construct your predictive analysis model.
trans-unit.target: There is no programming required, just visually connecting datasets and modules to construct your predictive analysis model.

trans-unit.source: ![Azure ML Studio diagram: Create experiments, read data for many sources, write scored data, write models.][ml-studio-overview]
trans-unit.target: ![Azure ML Studio diagram: Create experiments, read data for many sources, write scored data, write models.][ml-studio-overview]

trans-unit.source: Get started with Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Get started with Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: When you first enter [Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net) you see the **Home** page.
trans-unit.target: When you first enter [Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net) you see the **Home** page.

trans-unit.source: From here you can view documentation, videos, webinars, and find other valuable resources.
trans-unit.target: From here you can view documentation, videos, webinars, and find other valuable resources.

trans-unit.source: There are three tabs across the top: **Home** (where you start), **Studio**, and **Gallery**.
trans-unit.target: There are three tabs across the top: **Home** (where you start), **Studio**, and **Gallery**.

trans-unit.source: Studio
trans-unit.target: Studio

trans-unit.source: Click the **Studio** tab and you'll be asked to sign in using your Microsoft account, or your work or school account.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Studio** tab and you'll be asked to sign in using your Microsoft account, or your work or school account.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you'll see the following tabs on the left:
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you'll see the following tabs on the left:

trans-unit.source: **EXPERIMENTS** - Experiments that have been created, run, and saved as drafts
trans-unit.target: **EXPERIMENTS** - Experiments that have been created, run, and saved as drafts

trans-unit.source: **WEB SERVICES** - Web services that you have deployed from your experiments
trans-unit.target: **WEB SERVICES** - Web services that you have deployed from your experiments

trans-unit.source: **NOTEBOOKS** - Jupyter notebooks that you have created
trans-unit.target: **NOTEBOOKS** - Jupyter notebooks that you have created

trans-unit.source: **DATASETS** - Datasets that you have uploaded into Studio
trans-unit.target: **DATASETS** - Datasets that you have uploaded into Studio

trans-unit.source: **TRAINED MODELS** - Models that you have trained in experiments and saved in Studio
trans-unit.target: **TRAINED MODELS** - Models that you have trained in experiments and saved in Studio

trans-unit.source: **SETTINGS** - A collection of settings that you can use to configure your account and resources.
trans-unit.target: **SETTINGS** - A collection of settings that you can use to configure your account and resources.

trans-unit.source: Gallery
trans-unit.target: Gallery

trans-unit.source: Click the **Gallery** tab and you'll be taken to the Cortana Analytics Gallery.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Gallery** tab and you'll be taken to the Cortana Analytics Gallery.

trans-unit.source: The Gallery is a place where a community of data scientists and developers can share solutions created using components of the Cortana Analytics Suite.
trans-unit.target: The Gallery is a place where a community of data scientists and developers can share solutions created using components of the Cortana Analytics Suite.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Gallery, see [Share and discover solutions in the Cortana Analytics Gallery](machine-learning-gallery-how-to-use-contribute-publish.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about the Gallery, see [Share and discover solutions in the Cortana Analytics Gallery](machine-learning-gallery-how-to-use-contribute-publish.md).

trans-unit.source: Components of an experiment
trans-unit.target: Components of an experiment

trans-unit.source: An experiment consists of datasets that provide data to analytical modules, which you connect together to construct a predictive analysis model.
trans-unit.target: An experiment consists of datasets that provide data to analytical modules, which you connect together to construct a predictive analysis model.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, a valid experiment has these characteristics:
trans-unit.target: Specifically, a valid experiment has these characteristics:

trans-unit.source: The experiment has at least one dataset and one module
trans-unit.target: The experiment has at least one dataset and one module

trans-unit.source: Datasets may be connected only to modules
trans-unit.target: Datasets may be connected only to modules

trans-unit.source: Modules may be connected to either datasets or other modules
trans-unit.target: Modules may be connected to either datasets or other modules

trans-unit.source: All input ports for modules must have some connection to the data flow
trans-unit.target: All input ports for modules must have some connection to the data flow

trans-unit.source: All required parameters for each module must be set
trans-unit.target: All required parameters for each module must be set

trans-unit.source: You can create an experiment from scratch, or you can use an existing sample experiment as a template.
trans-unit.target: You can create an experiment from scratch, or you can use an existing sample experiment as a template.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use sample experiments to create new experiments](machine-learning-sample-experiments.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Use sample experiments to create new experiments](machine-learning-sample-experiments.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a simple experiment, see [Create a simple experiment in Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-create-experiment.md).
trans-unit.target: For an example of creating a simple experiment, see [Create a simple experiment in Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-create-experiment.md).

trans-unit.source: For a more complete walkthrough of creating a predictive analytics solution, see [Develop a predictive solution with Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-walkthrough-develop-predictive-solution.md).
trans-unit.target: For a more complete walkthrough of creating a predictive analytics solution, see [Develop a predictive solution with Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-walkthrough-develop-predictive-solution.md).

trans-unit.source: Datasets
trans-unit.target: Datasets

trans-unit.source: A dataset is data that has been uploaded to Machine Learning Studio so that it can be used in the modeling process.
trans-unit.target: A dataset is data that has been uploaded to Machine Learning Studio so that it can be used in the modeling process.

trans-unit.source: A number of sample datasets are included with Machine Learning Studio for you to experiment with, and you can upload more datasets as you need them.
trans-unit.target: A number of sample datasets are included with Machine Learning Studio for you to experiment with, and you can upload more datasets as you need them.

trans-unit.source: Here are some examples of included datasets:
trans-unit.target: Here are some examples of included datasets:

trans-unit.source: **MPG data for various automobiles** - Miles per gallon (MPG) values for automobiles identified by number of cylinders, horsepower, etc.
trans-unit.target: **MPG data for various automobiles** - Miles per gallon (MPG) values for automobiles identified by number of cylinders, horsepower, etc.

trans-unit.source: **Breast cancer data** - Breast cancer diagnosis data.
trans-unit.target: **Breast cancer data** - Breast cancer diagnosis data.

trans-unit.source: **Forest fires data** - Forest fire sizes in northeast Portugal.
trans-unit.target: **Forest fires data** - Forest fire sizes in northeast Portugal.

trans-unit.source: As you build an experiment you can choose from the list of datasets available to the left of the canvas.
trans-unit.target: As you build an experiment you can choose from the list of datasets available to the left of the canvas.

trans-unit.source: For a list of sample datasets included in Machine Learning Studio, see [Use the sample data sets in Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-use-sample-datasets.md).
trans-unit.target: For a list of sample datasets included in Machine Learning Studio, see [Use the sample data sets in Azure Machine Learning Studio](machine-learning-use-sample-datasets.md).

trans-unit.source: Modules
trans-unit.target: Modules

trans-unit.source: A module is an algorithm that you can perform on your data.
trans-unit.target: A module is an algorithm that you can perform on your data.

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Studio has a number of modules ranging from data ingress functions to training, scoring, and validation processes.
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Studio has a number of modules ranging from data ingress functions to training, scoring, and validation processes.

trans-unit.source: Here are some examples of included modules:
trans-unit.target: Here are some examples of included modules:

trans-unit.source: [Convert to ARFF][convert-to-arff] - Converts a .NET serialized dataset to Attribute-Relation File Format (ARFF).
trans-unit.target: [Convert to ARFF][convert-to-arff] - Converts a .NET serialized dataset to Attribute-Relation File Format (ARFF).

trans-unit.source: [Compute Elementary Statistics][elementary-statistics] - Calculates elementary statistics such as mean, standard deviation, etc.
trans-unit.target: [Compute Elementary Statistics][elementary-statistics] - Calculates elementary statistics such as mean, standard deviation, etc.

trans-unit.source: [Linear Regression][linear-regression] - Creates an online gradient descent-based linear regression model.
trans-unit.target: [Linear Regression][linear-regression] - Creates an online gradient descent-based linear regression model.

trans-unit.source: [Score Model][score-model] - Scores a trained classification or regression model.
trans-unit.target: [Score Model][score-model] - Scores a trained classification or regression model.

trans-unit.source: As you build an experiment you can choose from the list of modules available to the left of the canvas.
trans-unit.target: As you build an experiment you can choose from the list of modules available to the left of the canvas.

trans-unit.source: A module may have a set of parameters that you can use to configure the module's internal algorithms.
trans-unit.target: A module may have a set of parameters that you can use to configure the module's internal algorithms.

trans-unit.source: When you select a module on the canvas, the module's parameters are displayed in the **Properties** pane to the right of the canvas.
trans-unit.target: When you select a module on the canvas, the module's parameters are displayed in the **Properties** pane to the right of the canvas.

trans-unit.source: You can modify the parameters in that pane to tune your model.
trans-unit.target: You can modify the parameters in that pane to tune your model.

trans-unit.source: For some help navigating through the large library of machine learning algorithms available, see [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md).
trans-unit.target: For some help navigating through the large library of machine learning algorithms available, see [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md).

trans-unit.source: Deploying a predictive analytics web service
trans-unit.target: Deploying a predictive analytics web service

trans-unit.source: Once your predictive analytics model is ready, you can deploy it as a web service right from Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: Once your predictive analytics model is ready, you can deploy it as a web service right from Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: For more details on this process, see [Deploy an Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md).
trans-unit.target: For more details on this process, see [Deploy an Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md).
